name: Bumper Parker
description:
The game is local multiplayer

Best played with multiple players

The goal is to compete on the parkings.

To win a parking, you must stand on it alone for 3 seconds.

First player to reach 5 parkings wins.

Bump into others, interfere by standing on the same parking, sneak your way to a free parking, do what ever you need to reach the goal.

Best played with multiple players (it is a competition  after all), but works with one as well.

movement (acceleration and steering) - wasd/arrows

acceleration - left stick (controller)

steer - right

brake + drift - space / R1

boost speed - shift / L1

respawn after 3 seconds of being off the ground - R / Left button (square on ps4)

It was tested on a ps4 controller, but might work on other controllers as well.
